Package org.anchoranalysis.image.object.morphological

Class MorphologicalDilation

MorphologicalDilation

extends Object

  • Method Details

    • createDilatedObject

      public static ObjectMask createDilatedObject​(ObjectMask object, Optional<Extent> extent, boolean do3D, int iterations, boolean bigNeighborhood) throws CreateException
      Dilates an object-mask, growing the bounding-box as necessary.
      Parameters:
      object - the object to dilate
      extent - if present, restricts the obejct to remain within certain bounds
      do3D - whether to perform dilation in 3D or 2D
      iterations - number of dilations to perform
      Returns:
      a newly created object-mask with bounding-box grown in relevant directions by iterations
      Throws:
      CreateException

    • dilate

      public static BinaryVoxels<ByteBuffer> dilate​(BinaryVoxels<ByteBuffer> bvb, boolean do3D, int iterations, Optional<Voxels<ByteBuffer>> backgroundVb, int minIntensityValue, boolean bigNeighborhood) throws CreateException
      Throws:
      CreateException

    • dilate

      public static BinaryVoxels<ByteBuffer> dilate​(BinaryVoxels<ByteBuffer> bvb, boolean do3D, int iterations, Optional<Voxels<ByteBuffer>> backgroundVb, int minIntensityValue, boolean zOnly, boolean outsideAtThreshold, Optional<AcceptIterationConditon> acceptConditions, boolean bigNeighborhood) throws CreateException
      Performs a morpholgical dilation operation

      TODO: merge do3D and zOnly parameters into an enum

      Parameters:
      bvb - input-buffer
      do3D - if TRUE, 6-neighborhood dilation, otherwise 4-neighnrouhood
      iterations - number of dilations
      backgroundVb - optional background-buffer that can influence the dilation with the minIntensityValue
      minIntensityValue - minimumIntensity on the background, for a pixel to be included
      zOnly - if TRUE, only peforms dilation in z direction. Requires do3D to be TRUE
      outsideAtThreshold - if TRUE, pixels outside the buffer are treated as ON, otherwise as OFF
      acceptConditions - if non-NULL, imposes a condition on each iteration that must be passed
      Returns:
      a new buffer containing the results of the dilation-operations
      Throws:
      CreateException
